item.description:
Oktoberfest is coming! Come help the Beanstalks plan for our upcoming weekend on October 16-17, 2010, with the theme of Oktoberfest. Our weekend will be in Provincetown, and our weekend chairman is our president, John Bewick. We need to plan themes for after-hours. We need to plan day trips, and lots of little details. We need your help. Bring your ideas, your notepads, and your appetite.

DIRECTIONS:
Take Route 128 to exit 33A. Then take Route 3a south 1/2 to 1 miles. Turn left at the third light into the Crossroads Shopping Center. Outback Steakhouse is on the left.
item.name: Dinner at the Outback & Weekend Planning Meeting
